description: Made from a blend of cotton and wool yarn. Inspired by a '40s surplus sweater. Contrast-knit construction with racking and seed stitches throughout. Ribbed cuffs and hem. Genuine horn buttons.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 26" body length (front and back), a 17" shoulder, a 40" chest, and a 24½" sleeve length. Sleeve length changes ½" between sizes.
Shawl collar with a two-button closure at the right side. Five-button placket. Genuine horn buttons.
